p: To determine the TFC, 1 ml of diluted plant extract was mixed with 1 ml of 2% AlCl 3 methanolic solution. After incubation at room temperature for 15 min, the absorbance of the reaction mixture was measured at 430 nm. Quercetin was chosen as a standard, and a standard curve was prepared (0–50 mg/L). The TFC was expressed as mg quercetin equivalents/g for dry weight (Djeridane et al., 2006; Riahi et al., 2013). All samples were analyzed in duplicate.
